thig2.2:1.1: "These here are the seven factors of enlightenment,
thig2.2:1.2: obtained from the path of awakening.
thig2.2:1.3: All cultivated by you and me,
thig2.2:2.1: I have seen the Blessed One,
thig2.2:2.2: indeed this is my last body.
thig2.2:2.4: no there is no coming back to any state of being."
